729677f-a.title: Richmond: South Avenue - Richmond Terrace
729677f-a.text:
South Avenue, west side, 150 feet south of
Richmond Terrace. TVhe house belonged to G. DeHart in 1874;
to Williams from 1898 to 1907, and to M.A. Sinn in 1917. Dates
refer to maps on which the owners' names appear.
eptember 28, 1924
By William T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
